short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 🎞 ️Video Assistant, a video extension tool, you can easily use this tool to operate the player of any web page.
short.zh_CN,zh_TW: 🎞 ️视频助手，一个视频扩展工具，可以方便的使用该工具，对任意网页的播放器进行操作。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a video extension tool that allows you to easily operate the player on any web page. We provide a variety of useful features, including video acceleration, volume adjustment, picture-in-picture, fill, video recording, screenshot, etc. We hope you can try to use the tool and provide us with valuable feedback. Finally, we wish you a happy use! 😄😄😄😄😄

If you encounter any problems during use, please don't panic. Negative reviews cannot solve the problem. You can provide feedback via the link below and I will follow up promptly.

👉 https://logspot.hocgin.top/addone-svideo?active=feedback 👈

If this has been helpful to you, can you please give me a good review? 🌹
long.zh_CN,zh_TW:
这是一个视频扩展工具，它可以让您方便地对任意网页的播放器进行操作。我们提供了多种实用的功能，包括视频加速播放、音量扩大调整、画中画、铺满、视频下载、录制、截图等。希望您能够尝试使用该工具，并给我们提供宝贵的反馈。最后，祝您使用愉快！😄😄😄😄😄

如果在使用过程中遇到问题，请不要着急，差评并不能解决问题。您可以在下方链接进行反馈，我会及时跟进的。
👉 https://logspot.hocgin.top/addone-svideo?active=feedback 👈
